import React, {useState} from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import APIService from "./APIService"; export default function (props) { let [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("signin") const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "signin" ? "signup" : "signin") } if (authMode === "signin") { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [mail, setMail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const insertUser = () => { APIService.InsertUser({name, username, mail, password}) .then((response) => props.insertedUser(response)) .catch(error => console.log('Error while creating user', username)) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() insertArticle() setTitle('') setBody('') } return (
